title: PYCLTS. A Python library for the handling of phonetic transcription systems
description:
Cite the library as:

List, Johann-Mattis; Anderson, Cormac; Tresoldi, Tiago; Forkel, Robert (2020): PYCLTS. A Python library for the handling of phonetic transcription systems. Version 3.0.0.
